inputFields.name: activeWithinDays
inputFields.description: The range of date from the past until today, for the recent activity

inputFields.name: canReceiveEmails
inputFields.description: Searching only the members who can or cannot receive mass email

inputFields.name: excludedUsers
inputFields.description: The members to exclude from result

inputFields.name: groups
inputFields.description: The groups which the member belongs to

inputFields.name: joinDateTimeMax
inputFields.description: The latest time limit for member join

inputFields.name: joinDateTimeMin
inputFields.description: The oldest time limit for member join

inputFields.name: query
inputFields.description: raw query string to search from member name or city

inputFields.name: roles
inputFields.description: List of member roles to search by

inputFields.name: users
inputFields.description: The member ids that may belong to the organization
